Game.Name: No Rules - Get Phat (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
Game.plot: No Rules: Get Phat is an Action game, developed by Flying Tiger Development and published by TDK Mediactive, which was released in 2001.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/476950.htmlCheat: Passwords for access to all levelsLevel Passwords
Game.Notes: One Eye Jack, a badass little skate fiend and leader of the No Rules posse, must stop an alien invasion of his local hangouts. To achieve his goal, he must board like a pro, be a dead-eye shot with his slingshot and alien slime gun, and grind the rails of social irresponsibility-all in the name of preserving his lifestyle.
